PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-07812019-06-13,  ,  PS,  HC,  ,  , 
ActCannabis Act
SubjectOrder Amending Schedules 3 and 4 to the Cannabis Act
PrecisORDER AMENDING SCHEDULES 3 AND 4 TO THE CANNABIS ACT in order to permit a broader diversity of cannabis products to be legally sold in Canada, consistent with the Government of Canada's objective of enabling the legal cannabis industry to displace the illegal market.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0207 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
AttachmentsAttachment
